com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Bg5Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Bg5Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Bg5Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the BG5

    The class provides methods to control BG5 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a BG5 device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new BG5 device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect BG5 device.

      • Bg5Control

        public Bg5Control(java.lang.String userName,
          com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseComm com,
          Context context,
          java.lang.String mac,
          java.lang.String type,
          boolean needRead,
          com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseCommCallback mBaseCommCallback,
          com.ihealth.communication.ins.InsCallback insCallback)
        a constructor for Bg5Contorl.
        Parameters:
        com - class for communication.
        context - Context.
        mac - valid Bluetooth address(without colon).
        type - valid Bluetooth name.
        needRead - flag to get the version of Bg device
        mBaseCommCallback - communication callback
        insCallback - Bg series protocol callback.

      • setBottleMessage

        public void setBottleMessage(java.lang.String QRCode,
                    byte stripNum,
                    java.lang.String overDate)
        Set bottleInfo to current Bg device
        Parameters:
        QRCode - QRCode of scan（the result of scan the QR on the strip bottle）
        stripNum - set strip num (stripNum >=0 && stripNum <= 255)
        overDate - set expire time (formate as "2016-03-01")
